about.miniBio: Front-end developer, with 10 years of experience and more than 100 websites programmed from scratch. Co-founder of the VALUE Digital Marketing Agency and the RUP Collective for free education. Completely dedicated to exploring the future and its technologies.

skills.content: HTML, CSS, Javascript, React JS, Next JS, Wordpress, Tailwind CSS, Vite JS, Webpack

skills.content: Organization, People Management, Project Management, Presentations, Pitch, Problem Solving, Ease of Dealing with Pressure

Business content creation. There were more than 100 publications made between lives, scripting, recording and editing reels for Instagram, stories and feed posts
